actortab-button.creating: Hero Mancer is creating your character! ... This may take a moment.
actortab-button.loading: Hero Mancer is loading! ... This may take a moment.
actortab-button.name: Hero Mancer

abilities.default: prides themself on their impressive abilities

instructions.chained-rolls: Your DM has enabled Chained Rolls. Simply click on one of the dice above to roll all your stats. Don't worry! You can individually re-roll entries, assuming your DM allows it.

manual.description: For each ability below, roll the designated formula (default is 4d6 drop the lowest), and enter the result as your ability score. Repeat for each ability.
manual.preamble: The Manual Rolling method allows you to create a unique character profile by rolling dice to determine each ability score. By default, this uses the classic 4d6 drop the lowest method, but your DM may specify a custom rolling formula. While the results of this method can range from strong to average or even low scores, it adds an element of unpredictability to character building that can yield distinct strengths and weaknesses. This method is perfect for creating varied characters in short campaigns or one-shots, where surprising stats can inspire creative roleplaying. Embrace the randomness and enjoy the unique outcomes!
manual.title: Stat Generation Method: Manual Rolling

instructions.no-roll-method: Error loading a valid roll method, please report to developer.

point-buy.description: Assign points to each ability score. You have a base of 27 points to spend, with the maximum score capped at 15.
point-buy.preamble: The Point Buy method provides flexibility by allowing you to assign a set number of points to your abilities. Distribute your points across abilities to create a balanced or specialized character profile. Each score above 8 has a point cost, so plan wisely!
point-buy.title: Stat Generation Method: Point Buy

standard-array.description: For each ability below, choose a value from the dropdown. Keep in mind your class and character goals when deciding. You can only use a value once.
standard-array.preamble: The Standard Array allows you to assign a set of predefined scores to your character's ability scores, designed to keep characters balanced and simplify character creation. This method is ideal for new players or those wanting a consistent, balanced setup across the party, ensuring each character begins on the same power level. Remember, your racial bonuses will still influence your final ability scores. Consider your class and racial bonuses carefully as you place these scores to optimize your character’s performance in their primary role.
standard-array.title: Stat Generation Method: Standard Array

abilities.label: Ability

background.preamble: Choose your character's background from the available options.
background.tooltip: Select a background for your character

class.preamble: Choose your character's class from the available options.
class.tooltip: Select a class for your character

equipment.preamble: The equipment tab in the Hero Mancer character creation tool now allows players to fully manage their character's gear and starting resources. Players can select class, background, and race-specific equipment, as well as choose from starting equipment packages or starting wealth rules. This provides a comprehensive workflow for equipping the character during the creation process.
equipment.wealth-roll-message: {name} rolled for {type} starting wealth & received: {result} gp.

finalize.backstory-placeholder: Write a backstory for your character. Consider what organizations they belong to, any allies they've made or enemies they've earned, and other important details from their life before becoming an adventurer.
finalize.bonds-placeholder: Who or what is most dear to your character? What place feels like home? What object means everything to them? Press the Roll button to draw from bonds suggested by your background.
finalize.bonds-placeholder-alt: Who or what is most dear to your character? What place feels like home? What object means everything to them?
finalize.flaws-placeholder: What are your character's shortcomings or weaknesses? Consider both personality quirks and ability score limitations. What traits might others find difficult? Press the Roll button to draw from flaws suggested by your background.
finalize.flaws-placeholder-alt: What are your character's shortcomings or weaknesses? Consider both personality quirks and ability score limitations. What traits might others find difficult?
finalize.ideals-placeholder: What principles guide your character? What cause or belief drives them to adventure? What would they fight or die for? Press the Roll button to draw from ideals suggested by your background.
finalize.ideals-placeholder-alt: What principles guide your character? What cause or belief drives them to adventure? What would they fight or die for?

summary.abilities: prides themself on their impressive {first} and {second}
summary.abilitiesDefault: prides themself on their impressive abilities
summary.default: Starting as an adventurer, this unknown race unknown class prides themself on their impressive abilities and begins their adventure.

finalize.traits-placeholder: Describe your character's personality. How do their abilities shape who they are? Are they wise and contemplative, or charismatic and outgoing? Press the Roll button to draw from personality traits suggested by your background.
finalize.traits-placeholder-alt: Describe your character's personality. How do their abilities shape who they are? Are they wise and contemplative, or charismatic and outgoing?

app.journal-description-placeholder: The Journal is loading. This is a placeholder.

nav.next-description: Continue to the next step in character creation
nav.previous-description: Go back to the previous step in character creation

app.no-description: Unable to load a valid description for this item.
app.optionsReset: Reset Hero Mancer! Let's try again!
app.optionsSaved: Options saved! Re-open Hero Mancer to continue where you left off!

race.preamble: Choose your character's race from the available options.
race.tooltip: Select a race for your character

start.name-placeholder: Choose a name for your character
start.player-color-placeholder: Choose a color for your player

preamble.text:
This interactive character creator will guide you through building your perfect character for FoundryVTT. During this process, you'll choose attributes, race, class, and background; set your ability scores with your choice of stat method; customize starting equipment; and develop your character's biography.

Navigate between sections using the tabs above or, if enabled by your DM, the Next/Previous buttons below - your progress is saved automatically. Use 'Save for Later' to continue another time.

Required fields are marked with and will change to when completed. The Submit button, located on the Finalize tab, will remain disabled until all mandatory fields are filled out.

When you're ready, press Submit to finalize your choices. You'll receive a few more prompts to make selections not covered by Hero Mancer, and then you're ready to play! The more detail you provide, the richer your character will be in your DM's world. Your journey begins now!
preamble.title: Welcome to Hero Mancer!

start.token-art-placeholder: Choose token art for your character

player-customization.hint: Allow your players to set some information up during character creation, such as player color, pronouns, and avatar.

randomize.hint: Allows users to randomize aspects of their character creation process. Useful for one shots, randomizer games, and loose cannons.

settings.reset-to-default: An empty field was detected in: {setting}! Reset to default value.

roll-delay.hint: Controls the delay (in milliseconds) between each roll when using chained rolling. Lower values make the process faster, while higher values make it easier to follow. This setting has no effect if you are manually rolling with physical dice.
roll-delay.name: Roll Animation Delay

skin-tones.hint: Comma-separated list of skin tones used for character randomization.
skin-tones.name: Skin Tones

standard-array-swap-mode.hint: When enabled, selecting a value that's already in use will swap values between abilities instead of clearing the previous selection. This helps when you want to rearrange your ability scores.
standard-array-swap-mode.name: Standard Array Swap Mode

token-customization.hint: Allow your players to set some default token settings usually reserved for the GM, such as display name status, dynamic token ring settings, and display bars.
token-customization.name: Allow Token Customization

troubleshooter.notes: The troubleshooter contains all relevant information needed to start the bug-squashing process. Using the buttons below, you can save this output as a file or copy it to your clipboard. Feel free to join the Discord or create an issue on Github.
troubleshooter.title: Troubleshooter
